-| assets/

-| components/
---| AppHeader.vue
---| AppFooter.vue

-| composables/
---| useFoo.ts

-| layouts/
---| default.vue
---| custom.vue

-| middleware/
---| analytics.global.ts
---| setup.global.ts
---| auth.ts

-| modules/

-| pages/
---| index.vue
---| users-[group]/
-----| [id].vue

-| plugins/
---| foo.ts      // scanned
---| bar/
-----| baz.ts    // not scanned
-----| foz.vue   // not scanned
-----| index.ts  // currently scanned but deprecated

-| shared/

---| formatters

---| utils/
-----| lower.ts           # Auto-imported
-----| formatters
-------| upper.ts         # Not auto-imported

---| types/
-----| bar.d.ts           # Auto-imported
